message: Or is there a service to throw a bunch of feeds into and create a "channel"?

I love the "Radio Leo" feed, but would like to find a feed for all the videos (small) to have in one place. It would save a lot of time each week in organizing and finding what's new in my extensive podcast download library. Is there one available?
I use smart playlists in iTunes to Do something like this. I add the video podcasts to the smart playlist once and they automatically appear together when downloaded.
I would love a feed that has all the shows -- I subscribe to the audio-only version of Radio Leo, and I've wondered why there isn't one that just has everything.
@GavinKnight Can you point me to a url to help me figure out Yahoo pipes for this purpose?

@RevTim Probably more user friendly to get an account at mediafly.com - they have clients for a wide range of devices (phones, media streamers, game consoles, just the browser) - and you can create feeds consisting of other feeds, and mediafly will sort them as you view and new stuff comes in.
@RevTim you'd have to google it sorry
